thread.title: Lynlee Helen Hynes
thread.title_full: DogVacay reviewed by Lynlee Helen Hynes

author: Lynlee Helen Hynes
title: Lynlee Helen Hynes
text: I have used DogVacay once so far, but I am honestly excited to use it again. I found a sitter very quickly and was able to contact her and discuss my dogs' needs before the initial meeting. I live in Jacksonville, FL and found a sitter in Chapel Hill, NC for a weekend vacation. The woman who watched my dogs was exceptional and I was beyond pleased to leave my kids with her. DogVacay for the win.
